DOC.brief_summary: The study propose 48-patient randomized-controlled pilot study use Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) image compare stent strut coverage malapposition three second-generation Drug Eluting Stents ( DES ) [ Xience EES ( Abbott Vascular , Santa Clara , CA ) , Resolute Integrity ZES ( Medtronic , Minneapolis , MN ) Promus Element EES ( Boston Scientific , Natick , MA ) ] 6 week post implantation . Study Hypothesis rate stent strut coverage malapposition Xience EES , Promus EES similar improve ( high rate stent strut coverage lower rate malapposition ) compare Resolute ZES 6 week post-implantation .
DOC.brief_title: Serial Evaluation Drug-Eluting Stents Using OCT ( STRUT-OCT )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age great equal 18 year 2 . Clinical need percutaneous coronary intervention use either Xience , Promus Element , Resolute Integrity drugeluting stent use optical coherence tomography optimization 3 . Native coronary artery de novo lesion ≥70 % angiographic percent diameter stenosis visual estimation 4 . Target vessel reference diameter 2.5 4.0 mm visual estimate 5 . Target lesion ≤28 mm length visual estimate 6 . Agree participate provide inform consent 1.Presentation acute STelevation myocardial infarction ( define electrocardiographic ( ECG ) STelevation ≥ 2 mm 2 contiguous ECG lead along symptom compatible ischemia )
